title: Rito
body: Rito what did you do. I go to log on and I see this. should I call the firemen?

replies.body:
I lost my promos to challenger because of these server issues tbh

thanks riot give me 100 rp or I quit
Bring up a ticket and they might nullify the game losses. as its a known issue now they might make them 'loss protected' games
{{champion:84}}  apparently due to a break in the internet cable haha.....smoke and mirrors {{champion:238}}
I think its safe to say we all need to panic!
